attributes.action: Urge estate agents to sign up to a voluntary code of practice not to advertise properties as second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a particular issue in rural areas where a lot of homes ideal for First time buyers are being bought up by investers. This drives prices up and prevents local businesses from employing local people as they have to relocate.

rejection.details: Your petition has already been posted http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nosecondhomes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
